com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.game.service

接口 GameInstanceService

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractGameInstanceService, BingoGameInstanceService, DigitalGameInstanceService, ExtraballGameInstanceService, LfnGameInstanceService, LottoGameInstanceService, Magic100GameInstanceService, RaffleGameInstanceService, ToToGameInstanceService, UnionGameInstanceService

    public interface GameInstanceService
    Each game type should provide a dedicated implementation.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void allowPayout(Context respCtx, java.util.List<? extends BaseTicket> hostTickets, boolean isEnquiry)
      Whether the game instances associate with ticket are ready for payout.
      BaseGameInstance enquiry(Context respCtx, java.lang.String gameId, java.lang.String number)
      Lookup game instance by given gameId and number which has been allocated to given merchant.
      java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquiryMultiDraw(Context respCtx, java.lang.String gameId, java.lang.String number, int multipleDraws)
      Lookup sequential multipleDraws game instances since the game instance which identified by gameId and number.
      java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response)
      Lookup all active and sale-ready game instances of given gameType which have been allocated to given merchant.
      java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response, java.lang.String gameId)
      Lookup active and sale-ready game instance of given game which has been allocated to given merchant.
      java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response, java.lang.String gameId, java.lang.String number, int multipleDraws)
      Lookup sequential multipleDraws ready-for-sale game instances from the given one which is identified by gameID and number which has been allocated to given merchant.

    • 方法详细资料

      • enquirySaleReady

        java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response)
                                                            throws ApplicationException
        Lookup all active and sale-ready game instances of given gameType which have been allocated to given merchant.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • enquirySaleReady

        java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response,
                                                          java.lang.String gameId)
                                                            throws ApplicationException
        Lookup active and sale-ready game instance of given game which has been allocated to given merchant. In general there should be only one game instance returned.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • enquiry

        BaseGameInstance enquiry(Context respCtx,
                       java.lang.String gameId,
                       java.lang.String number)
                         throws ApplicationException
        Lookup game instance by given gameId and number which has been allocated to given merchant.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • enquirySaleReady

        java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquirySaleReady(Context response,
                                                          java.lang.String gameId,
                                                          java.lang.String number,
                                                          int multipleDraws)
                                                            throws ApplicationException
        Lookup sequential multipleDraws ready-for-sale game instances from the given one which is identified by gameID and number which has been allocated to given merchant. The first game instance must be active, that is ready-for-sale.
        参数:
        gameId - The identifier of game of requested game instance.
        number - The number of game instance.
        multipleDraws - How many game instances required?
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • enquiryMultiDraw

        java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> enquiryMultiDraw(Context respCtx,
                                                          java.lang.String gameId,
                                                          java.lang.String number,
                                                          int multipleDraws)
                                                            throws ApplicationException
        Lookup sequential multipleDraws game instances since the game instance which identified by gameId and number.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        gameId - The identifier of game.
        number - The number of requested game instance.
        multipleDraws - How many game instances does the client request?
        返回:
        The requested game instances.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any biz exception.

      • allowPayout

        void allowPayout(Context respCtx,
               java.util.List<? extends BaseTicket> hostTickets,
               boolean isEnquiry)
                 throws ApplicationException
        Whether the game instances associate with ticket are ready for payout.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
